features: 【High-quality materials】Exfoliating body scrubber is made of nylon, soap saver is durable and easy to produce rich foam. Drying soap holder can be quickly cleaned by just rinsing under the faucet. Bar soap scrubber pouch fits most soap racks or travel soap boxes

【Lanyard design】The soap exfoliating bag comes with a lanyard for easy drying and storage, and the soap bar bag does not take up too much space in the bathroom. You can hold the soap bag firmly in your hand during bathing, and the bar soap foam lather pouch will not fall off because the foam is too slippery

【Exfoliating artifact】Soap savers for bar soap can be used as an exfoliating brush to gently remove dead skin cells and waste keratin, revealing your radiant skin. Bath and body works soap holder is smooth and non-irritating to the skin, protecting your body from being harmed by soap socks

【Save soap】The bar soap pouch can easily bubble up, and large pieces of soap or leftover soap can be loaded into the soap pouch without wasting soap residue. The soap saver bag is easy to operate and carry. The bar soap mesh bag for shower is perfect for the bathroom, kitchen sink, shower or bathtub

【What you will get】You will get 3 gray soap bags for soap bars with different hanging rope colors: dark green, orange, and orange-yellow. Each mesh soap bag measures approximately 7.87 × 4.72 × 0.2 inches / 20 × 12 × 0.5 cm. The body scrubber rough sponge is enough for you to change when taking a shower
description: Product description COMNICO 3PCS Soap Bag Nylon Exfoliating Soap Saver Pocket Mesh Bar Soap Foam Lather Pouch Drying Soap Holder Body Scrubber Rough Sponge Exfoliator for Bath Shower Category: Soap Bag Color: Gray Material: Nylon Function: Foaming Net for Face and Hand Washing, Bath Soap Bubble Net Product Size: 7.87 × 4.72 × 0.2 inches / 20 × 12 × 0.5 cm Packing Method: Bag Packing List: 3pcs × Soap Bag Directions Place a soap bar inside the mesh soap bag, wet the soap bag and scrubber, gently rub the scrubber on your skin to create lather, rinse off soap and dead skin cells, hang the soap bag to dry using the lanyard Safety Warning People with allergies to nylon should use with caution.
